moduleInfo.analyzersDescription:
**Functional Purpose**: Description of what Analyzers are for a task.
**UI Location**: Task tooltip → Module Info section → Analyzer details
**When Users See This**: When hovering over a task that involves 'analyzer' module
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Analyzers take code and generating automated suggestions for how to make code more idiomatic."
moduleInfo.conceptsDescription:
**Functional Purpose**: Description of what Concepts are for a task.
**UI Location**: Task tooltip → Module Info section → Concept details
**When Users See This**: When hovering over a task that involves 'concept' module
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Concepts are comprised of brief introductions and more complex explanations about a programming topic."
moduleInfo.learningExercisesDescription:
**Functional Purpose**: Description of what Learning Exercises are for a task.
**UI Location**: Task tooltip → Module Info section → Concept Exercise details
**When Users See This**: When hovering over a task that involves 'concept-exercise' module
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Learning Exercises teach one or more Concepts. They are signficiantly more complex to make than Practice Exercises."
moduleInfo.generatorsDescription:
**Functional Purpose**: Description of what Generators are for a task.
**UI Location**: Task tooltip → Module Info section → Generator details
**When Users See This**: When hovering over a task that involves 'generator' module
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Generators are pieces of tooling that Tracks use to keep in sync with our central set of exercises."
moduleInfo.practiceExercisesDescription:
**Functional Purpose**: Description of what Practice Exercises are for a task.
**UI Location**: Task tooltip → Module Info section → Practice Exercise details
**When Users See This**: When hovering over a task that involves 'practice-exercise' module
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Most exercises are Practice Exercises - they enable students to practice the Concepts they have learnt in Learning Exercises."
moduleInfo.representersDescription:
**Functional Purpose**: Description of what Representers are for a task.
**UI Location**: Task tooltip → Module Info section → Representer details
**When Users See This**: When hovering over a task that involves 'representer' module
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Representers create normalized versions of students' submissions, which can have mentoring comments attached to them."
moduleInfo.testRunnersDescription:
**Functional Purpose**: Description of what Test Runners are for a task.
**UI Location**: Task tooltip → Module Info section → Test Runner details
**When Users See This**: When hovering over a task that involves 'test-runner' module
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Test Runners allow Exercism to run students' code and determine whether they pass or fail the tests, and provide useful feedback to the student."
